title: Hair la Fleur - Hair Growth Vitamins for Women & Men | Natural Hair Volume & Regrowth Supplement with Biotin, Vitamins & Minerals | Supports Thicker, Stronger, Healthier Hair - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Hair la Fleur - Advanced Hair Growth & Volume Support

Transform your hair with Hair la Fleur, a comprehensive hair growth supplement designed to promote hair volume, regrowth, and overall hair health. Our scientifically-formulated blend combines essential vitamins, minerals, and herbal extracts to nourish hair follicles from within, supporting thicker, stronger, and healthier hair growth.

Key Benefits

  • Promotes Hair Growth & Regrowth: Biotin (600 mcg) and B-vitamins support healthy hair follicle function and stimulate new hair growth
  • Increases Hair Volume & Thickness: Horsetail extract and Bamboo extract rich in silica strengthen hair strands and improve hair density
  • Strengthens Hair Structure: Iron, Zinc, and Manganese support keratin production for stronger, more resilient hair
  • Prevents Hair Loss: Saw Palmetto and Nettle Root help block DHT, a hormone linked to hair loss
  • Nourishes Hair Follicles: Vitamins A, C, D3, and E provide antioxidant protection and support scalp health
  • Supports Natural Hair Color: PABA and Fo-Ti help maintain natural hair pigmentation

Powerful Ingredients

  • Biotin (600 mcg): Essential B-vitamin that supports keratin infrastructure for hair growth
  • B-Vitamin Complex: B1, B6, B12, Folic Acid, and B5 support energy metabolism and hair cell production
  • Iron (14.5 mg): Prevents hair loss caused by iron deficiency and supports oxygen delivery to hair follicles
  • Horsetail Extract: Rich in silica, strengthens hair and improves elasticity
  • Bamboo Extract: Natural source of silica for hair strength and shine
  • Fo-Ti: Traditional herb used for centuries to promote hair growth and prevent premature graying
  • Saw Palmetto: Helps block DHT to prevent hair thinning
  • Nettle Root: Supports scalp health and reduces inflammation
  • Spirulina: Nutrient-dense superfood that nourishes hair follicles

Who Should Use Hair la Fleur?

Perfect for anyone experiencing:

  • Thinning hair or hair loss
  • Slow hair growth
  • Weak, brittle hair
  • Lack of hair volume
  • Postpartum hair loss
  • Age-related hair changes

Suggested Use: Take 2 capsules daily with food for best results. For optimal hair growth, use consistently for at least 3 months.

Quality Assurance: Made with premium ingredients in a GMP-certified facility. Vegetarian capsules. No artificial colors or preservatives.
shortDescriptionHtml: Promote hair growth and volume with Hair la Fleur. Our advanced formula with Biotin, Horsetail Extract, Bamboo, Fo-Ti, Saw Palmetto, and essential vitamins supports thicker, stronger, healthier hair. Helps prevent hair loss and supports regrowth. 60 capsules.
